main event: A group of basketball-size, orange lights were spotted coasting down the sky with erratic zigzag motion, with one object appearing to explode over Sweetwater.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 7 minutes., The observed object was reported to be the size of a basketball., The lights emitted a brilliant orange flame., The sighting included an explosion over Sweetwater or Cheyenne., The observation was made by a noncommissioned officer from the U.S. Army.
